mapper.sql: id, internalorg, compile, applytime, applicant, grade, applyname, unit_id, applycode, lastUpdateTime, status_id, reviewstatus_id, reviewcotent, reviewscore, process_id, log_id, classify_id, creator_id, area_id, createtime, updator_id, starttime, endtime
mapper.select: select count(*) count from t_equip_base where date_format(createtime, '%Y%m') = date_format(curdate(), '%Y%m')

SELECT count(*) from t_equip_base p inner join t_approve_log log on log.business_id = p.id inner join t_approve_process pro on pro.id = log.process_id inner join t_approve_step step on step.id = log.step_id left join t_sys_unit unit1 on unit1.id = log.stepUnit_id left join t_sys_unit unit2 on unit2.id = p.unit_id left join user u1 on u1.id = log.stepUser_id left join user u2 on u2.id = p.applicant left join user u3 on u3.id = log.approvetor_id left join sysarea area on area.id = p.area_id left join item item1 on item1.id = p.status_id left join item item2 on item2.id = log.status_id left join item item3 on item3.id = unit1.gradetype
where log.datasign = '1' and p.id = #{projectId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b.id, b.internalorg, b.compile, b.applytime, b.applicant, b.applyname, b.unit_id, b.applycode, b.lastUpdateTime, b.status_id, b.reviewstatus_id, b.reviewcotent, b.reviewscore, b.process_id, b.log_id, b.classify_id, b.creator_id, b.area_id, b.createtime, b.updator_id, b.starttime, b.endtime, item3.id grade, item3.itemvalue gradeName, item1.itemvalue as statusName,u.name as applicantName,unit.name as unitName,item2.itemvalue as reviewstatusName FROM t_equip_base b left join item item1 on item1.id = b.status_id left join user u on u.id = b.applicant left join t_sys_unit unit on unit.id=b.unit_id left join item item2 on item2.id=b.reviewstatus_id left join item item3 on item3.id = unit.gradetype where b.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_equip_base (id, internalorg, compile, applytime, applicant, grade, applyname, unit_id, applycode, lastUpdateTime, status_id, reviewstatus_id, reviewcotent, reviewscore, process_id, log_id, classify_id, creator_id, area_id, createtime, updator_id, starttime, endtime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{internalorg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{compile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applicant,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewstatusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewcotent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_equip_base
id,
internalorg,
compile,
applytime,
applicant,
grade,
applyname,
unit_id,
applycode,
lastUpdateTime,
status_id,
reviewstatus_id,
reviewcotent,
reviewscore,
process_id,
log_id,
classify_id,
creator_id,
area_id,
createtime,
updator_id,
starttime,
endtime,
delstatus

mapper.update:
update t_equip_base
internalorg = #{internalorg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
compile = #{compile,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applytime = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
applicant = #{applicant,jdbcType=BIGINT},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
applyname = #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
applycode = #{applycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reviewstatus_id = #{reviewstatusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reviewcotent = #{reviewcotent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reviewscore = #{reviewscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classify_id = #{classifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator_id = #{updatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delstatus = #{delstatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_equip_base set internalorg = #{internalorg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, compile = #{compile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applytime = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applicant = #{applicant,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applyname = #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applycode = #{applycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reviewstatus_id = #{reviewstatusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reviewcotent = #{reviewcotent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reviewscore = #{reviewscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify_id = #{classifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updator_id = #{updatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_equip_base order by createtime desc limit 1;
